attributes.action: bring us the Care Bears, but put them on ice please
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We all remember the childhood classic that were the Care Bears. They truely were the bears that cared. Also their stomaches seemed to have special powers. Alas the cartoon series ended over 20 years ago, but we petition that we bring them back, and put them on ice. 

We are serious.
No really we are.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
